mapper.select: SELECT RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT_UUID AS recordScheduleResultUuid, RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID AS recordScheduleUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, ITEM_UUID AS itemUuid, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID AS disposalTypeUuid, INITIAL_DATE AS initialDate, DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE AS disposalDueDate, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_DATE AS disposalConfirmDate, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_REASON AS disposalConfirmReason, DISPOSAL_COMPLETE_DATE AS disposalCompleteDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT

SELECT RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT_UUID AS recordScheduleResultUuid, RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID AS recordScheduleUuid, STATUS_UUID AS statusUuid, ITEM_UUID AS itemUuid, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID AS disposalTypeUuid, INITIAL_DATE AS initialDate, DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE AS disposalDueDate, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_DATE AS disposalConfirmDate, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_REASON AS disposalConfirmReason, DISPOSAL_COMPLETE_DATE AS disposalCompleteDate, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT WHERE RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT_UUID = #{recordScheduleResultUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT SET RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = #{recordScheduleUuid}, STATUS_UUID = #{statusUuid}, ITEM_UUID = #{itemUuid}, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID = #{disposalTypeUuid}, INITIAL_DATE = #{initialDate}, DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE = #{disposalDueDate}, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_DATE = #{disposalConfirmDate}, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_REASON = #{disposalConfirmReason}, DISPOSAL_COMPLETE_DATE = #{disposalCompleteDate}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT_UUID = #{recordScheduleResultUuid}

INSERT INTO RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT ( RECORD_SCHEDULE_RESULT_UUID, RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID, STATUS_UUID, ITEM_UUID, DISPOSAL_TYPE_UUID, INITIAL_DATE, DISPOSAL_DUE_DATE, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_DATE, DISPOSAL_CONFIRM_REASON, DISPOSAL_COMPLETE_DATE, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{recordScheduleResultUuid}, #{recordScheduleUuid}, #{statusUuid}, #{itemUuid}, #{disposalTypeUuid}, #{initialDate}, #{disposalDueDate}, #{disposalConfirmDate}, #{disposalConfirmReason}, #{disposalCompleteDate}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
